Summary: Bright white light with red, blue, green, yellow, orange lights visible only to the camera.
divs: sighting detailsi was in my room when i got the fweoing to liik out the window. i noticed a bright white light in the sky. it appeared to stay in place. i grabbed my sont cybershot dsc-w210 and went outside on my balcony. the object was just above the treeline and stayed in place. i started taking pictures and videos on all the posible settings and zoom. the camera revealed that it had lights not visible to the naked eye.it showed red,blue,green,yellow,white,and sometines orange.in almost every photo it showed that the bottom was a solid blue and the top was either a solid red or solid yellow. it had blinking red,blue,green,yelloe lights on it(not the top\botom lights). the object made no noise. if it was a plane or chopper,i would have heard a noise as i have full hearing. the object was at first at an altitude of 500-2000 feet(est.) and appeared to be slowly gaining altitude. it was moving in a strange pattern. it went fast for 1 second,then hovered, then sped up,then hovered,and so on. it's longest perod of mvement was about 3 seconds and longest hover period was 40 minutes. it moved at a speed of maybe 0-100km\h(est.). there were planes and helicoptgers pasing by ib the area and in the footage.they showed faa lights. this object didn't.it was a clear sky and later had those very thin and small clouds.the object was heading in a east-to-west direction in the path of pearson int. airport.there are 2-3 airports near me. there is a fire station 5 minutes from my home.there are power lines and a rail-road not far from me. the object performed rapid accelerations and 90 degree turns. it even perfirmed a 130degree turn(est.).i don't know if anyone else saw it. no agencies contacted me.in the end the object disapeared behing my building still moving the same way i described it.it was 5-10 times bigger than a star and at least 20 times smaller than the mon. it was as bright,if not brighter than the moon. it may be the size of a house, or bigger(est.). i took about 114 photos and 17 videos all with different settings and sizes. some have motion blur but idon't have a tripod(yet). i felt nothing,smelled nothing,heard nothing. only saw it. i had full health before,during,and after the sighting. the winf was blowing north i think, and theobject moved west. not baloon.i saw no outline. i even have a short daytime footage of it long after all the stars are gone.please email me so i can send these 131 files to you. i first saw it at 12:45 am and last saw it on 5:40 am.
trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were 4 other sightings in Toronto on or around July 18th 2010
